title: Milo
content: Milo performs statistical testing to identify differential cell state abundance in single-cell omics experiments. It leverages nearest-neighbour graph neighbourhoods to group transcriptionally similar cells across experimental samples.
Hypothesis testing uses generalised linear and mixed effect models to identify which cell neighbourhoods (cell states) differ between experimental and study conditions.
